      Check two sets of Components against each other and return a set with duplicates Main goal for this method are external rules, imported as a set of components

      java.util.Set<Component> JrmdsManagement.getReferencingComponents(Project project, Component component)

      java.util.Set<Component> JrmdsManagement.getSingleReferencedNodes(Project p, Component c)
      returns a Set of all Components, referenced by c, which have NO other upstream references.
